Language Reference: Objects

null

< Back to Language Reference

    For information on built-in functions for working with objects, see the standard library Object module.

    • objets

    • punning

    • ident keys and columns

    • field names

    • object merge

    • update field

    • set new field

    • record objects

    • set, object order

    • object matching

    object has all of the keys in matcher, and that for every key shared between object and matcher:

    • object[key] matches matcher[key] if both values are objects
    • object[key] == matcher[key] otherwise
